func.brief: The echo function provides a means in which to capture the contents of the input stream.

arg.desc: A string that identifies the end-of-stream. When the echo function encounters this string, the capture of the input stream is ended. You must put a ';' on the end of the end-of-stream terminator.

ret.desc: The captured input stream is returned line by line in a str variable.

func.body: The echo function is useful in cases where portions of the input code need to be captured by HyperScript.
